page_content:
2019 SUSTAINABILITY REPORT77
SYKES Tech Academy was designed to develop 
specialists in qualified networks in the local market. The purpose is to create an internal group of technology specialists that can develop a professional career path in this area.  The goal is to achieve the Cisco Certified Networking Associated certification in a high percentage of participants. 
SYKES works along with Cisco Associated y CompTIA 
Partner.  Since 2004, SYKES has partnered with the Omar Dengo Foundation (FOD), a Cisco associate, to carry out Cisco technical programs. FOD, a non-profit private entity, is a leader in human development opportunity creation that uses innovative learning processes and digital technologies. 
SYKES and FOD work together with programs 
targeted at employees that depend on knowledge and experience to use network technology, thus achieving new levels of understanding and productivity. Current Curriculum 
• CompTIA A+
• CompTIA Server+
• CCNA Module 1: Introduction to Networking
• CCNA Module 2: Routing and Switching 
Essentials
• CCNA Module 3: Scaling Networks
• CCNA Module 4: Connecting Networks
• CCNA Security, Wireless
• CCNP R&S, Collaboration, Security
• Linux Essentials, II and III
• ITIL (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) 
• Virtualization (VMware)
• Introduction to programming: Python, C++
• Database: SQL
• Amazon Web Services (AWS)
